welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Zakiyah, Syria! This charming city known for its rich history and beautiful architecture is waiting for you to discover its hidden gems. Enjoy your stay and immerse yourself in the local culture."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Damascus International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Damascus International Airport handles the transportation of goods and freight.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport for a fee.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Masada Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Masada Airport handles all freight and logistics operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport for passengers.
